configuration.txt
Created Wed Aug 29 11:15:11 AKDT 2012

VirtualBox user configuration is under ${HOME}/.VirtualBox


The ${HOME}/.VirtualBox/VirtualBox.xml has home directory specific paths.  
The file is clearly commented to not edit:

<!--
** DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE.
** If you make changes to this file while any VirtualBox related application
** is running, your changes will be overwritten later, without taking effect.
** Use VBoxManage or the VirtualBox Manager GUI to make changes.
-->

The VirtualBox.xml registry with individual machine details:

<MachineRegistry>
  <MachineEntry uuid="{029152f5-d5d7-439c-b71e-53646a60fb9f}" \
src="/home/marcilr/VirtualBox VMs/gilalite/gilalite.vbox"/>
  <MachineEntry uuid="{a80f04fc-4ec5-49f6-8b08-607f000b13a7}" \
src="/home/marcilr/VirtualBox VMs/ajoite-non-domain/ajoite-non-domain.vbox"/>
  <MachineEntry uuid="{88a3af7f-5c32-441f-9340-ba2fc84737ba}" \
src="/home/marcilr/VirtualBox VMs/mohite/mohite.vbox"/>
</MachineRegistry>
